text: ileohgehayeo geudeul-eul yuhoghani geudeul-eun geu namuui yeolmaeleul masboass deola ittae geudeul-ui suchiga deuleona mae geudeul-eun nag-won-ui namus-ip-eulo mom eul gamssani junimkkeseo geudeul-eul bulleo naega neohuiege i namuui yeolmaeleul geumhago satan-eun neohui jeog-ila ileu ji anihaessdeonyo
